value.0: Stygium is a type of crystal only found on Aeten II and Maramere. In its pure, crystal form it is known to be suitable for use as a lightsaber crystal. When refined Stygium is mounted on a personalized lightsaber and wielded by a Force-sensitive, the natural cloaking attributes of the crystal augments the power of a stealth-minded Jedi in remaining unseen.

Stygium is a type of crystal only found on Aeten II and Maramere. In its pure, crystal form it is known to be suitable for use as a lightsaber crystal. When refined Stygium is mounted on a personalized lightsaber and wielded by a Force-sensitive, the natural cloaking attributes of the crystal augments the power of a stealth-minded Jedi in remaining unseen.
